post:
[Dedispec's](http://www.dedispec.com "Dedispec's") 2021 Black Friday Deals on Dedicated Servers. Below are all valid from 11/26 through 11/29 (11/26/2021 - 11/29/2021), unless stated otherwise, or while supplies last. As usual, promotions can't be used to replace existing services, new orders only.
<br>
Mining is allowed (excluding hard drive based mining). If you are looking to perform hard drive mining, please contact our sales team for available options.
<br>
